channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tropical Storm John Hits Mexico for the Second Time This Week
item.description: The storm made landfall again late Friday morning. At least eight people have died.

item.title: How our ping pong startup hit a $50M valuation in 5 years by tapping into automation
item.description: With Gen Z rising, expect more urban retail spaces to become experience-focused venues accessed via smartphone apps.

item.title: Ryan Reynolds’ ad platform seeks IPO with Morgan Stanley’s help
item.description: MNTN builds advertising software that helps brands promote themselves through campaigns on connected TVs.

item.title: The Most Galling Part of the Whole Eric Adams Affair
item.description: With all its talent, how did the city end up with a mayor accused of being an incessant petty grifter?

item.title: Inside a Josh Stein Ad Blasting Mark Robinson as ‘Unfit’ for North Carolina Governor
item.description: No “Black Nazi” quotations or porn-site references here. Just Robinson’s own bloodthirsty words.

item.title: Zelensky Finds Ukraine’s Fortunes Ties to the U.S. Election
item.description: A whirlwind week of top-level meetings failed to alleviate concerns in Kyiv that a Trump presidency could lead to a dramatic shift in American policy.

item.title: Naomi Campbell’s charity spent only 8.5% on causes, blew thousands on luxury

item.title: An Indicted Mayor and an Indicted Former President, and the Parallels Between
item.description: Eric Adams and Donald Trump, two political shape-shifters, have both insisted they’re victims of partisan prosecutions.
